children.value: Installing a package on a Dotnet project
The tl;dr is that you run
As for an example of the Stripe installation, run
and after a successful installation you will see the following in the

<Project Sdk="Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web">

  <PropertyGroup>
    <TargetFramework>netcoreapp3.1</TargetFramework>
  </PropertyGroup>

  <ItemGroup>
    <!-- The important reference for Stripe.net -->
    <PackageReference Include="Stripe.net" Version="34.13.0" />
  </ItemGroup>



</Project>

# add `Newtonsoft.Json` NuGet package
dotnet add package Newtonsoft.Json
# add specific version of package to a project
dotnet add ToDo.csproj package Microsoft.Azure.DocumentDB.Core -v 1.0.0
# add package using a specific NuGet source
dotnet add package Microsoft.AspNetCore.StaticFiles -s https://dotnet.myget.org/F/dotnet-core/api/v3/index.json

# show packages
dotnet list pacakge
# remove package
dotnet remove package $PACKAGE_NAME
